description: MainActivity class for an Android TV application managing fragment navigation and screen transitions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity hosting three fragment screens: Home, VideoDetails, and Player, and managing navigation between them.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity and loads the HomeFragment if no saved instance state exists.

methods.name: openDetails
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with VideoDetailsFragment showing selected video's details.

methods.name: playVideo
methods.description: Starts video playback in PlayerFragment, with optional resume position and context.

methods.name: playVideoWithContext
methods.description: Starts video playback with additional context such as row key, list of video IDs, and current index.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Handles navigating back in fragment stack or finishing activity if no more back stack entries.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Overrides default back button behavior to utilize goBack() method.
